game.name: Flow Mania
game.description: In Flow Mania you have to connect dots of the same color with pipes, creating a flow. You also have to fill the whole board to solve the level. And no crossing or overlapping are allowed.
game.metaTitle: Flow Mania, Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Flow Mania at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Flow Mania Game, Action Games, Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE TO CONNECT THE SAME COLOR DOTS , TRY TO FILL THE WHOLE AREA
game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS L CLICK OF MOUSE TO CONNECT THE SAME COLOR DOTS , TRY TO FILL THE WHOLE AREA
